comment: Lord only knows why, but a video I posted years ago is all of a sudden blowing up on Youtube for some reason. Maybe you guys will enjoy watching a compilation of protesters getting run over too.

      :snt1 (c / contrast-01

                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Lord"))
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG0-of (c2 / cause-01))
                  :mod (o / only))
            :ARG2 (b / blow-up-06

                        :ARG1-of (p2 / post-01
                              :ARG0 (ii / i)
                              :time (b2 / before
                                    :op1 (n2 / now)
                                    :quant (m2 / multiple
                                          :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                                :quant 1
                                                :unit (y / year))))))
                  :manner (s / sudden)
                  :medium (p3 / publication
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "YouTube"))
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (s2 / some))))
      :snt2 (p4 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (e / enjoy-01
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you
                        :mod (g / guy))
                  :ARG1 (w / watch-01

                              :ARG1 (p5 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (p6 / protest-01)
                                    :ARG1-of (r / run-over-12)))
                        :mod (t3 / too)))))

comment: Hey there, Racist comments are hurtful and unwanted. Please refrain from using them and consider other people’s feelings. Thank you
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 (c / comment-01
                        :ARG0 (r / racist)))
            :op2 (w / want-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 c)
            :mod (h2 / hey
                  :mode expressive))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (r2 / refrain-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 c))
            :op2 (c2 / consider-02
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (f / feel-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :mod (o / other)))))
      :snt3 (t / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)))

comment: Racial slurs are considered hate speech and should not be used online. be courteous to others online who don't want to read those words.
amr:

      :snt1 (c / consider-01

                        :mod (r / race))))
      :snt2 (r2 / recommend-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 s2
                  :location (o / online)))
      :snt3 (p / polite-01
